isis.stitle: BP-R1 BOBTAIL BRAKE PROPORTIONING RELAY VALVE AND LQ-5 BOBTAIL LIMITING VALVE - SERVICE CHECKS - LQ-5 LEAKAGE TEST

svcproc.title: LQ-5 LEAKAGE TEST

step1.para: Build system pressure to governor cut-out. With the trailer air supply valve pushed in (tractor-trailer mode), apply soap solution to the LQ-5 exhaust port. Leakage should not exceed a one inch diameter bubble in less than 3 seconds.

Make and hold a full brake application and apply a soap solution to the exhaust port and around the cover where it joins the body. Leakage should not exceed a one inch diameter bubble in less than 3 seconds.

svcproc.para: If the leakage rates are not within limits, the LQ-5 valve should be repaired or replaced.
